wentWell: Set up complete memory system (knowledge graph, daily notes, MEMORY.md)
Installed and configured qmd for local search
Set up GitHub repo for PR workflow
Implemented cost-saving Haiku triage for Slack
Good collaboration rhythm with Andrew - direct, no fluff
didntGoWell: Haiku model name wrong initially (claude-3-5-haiku-latest doesn't exist)
AppleScript email queries slow and sometimes timing out
Didn't operationalize Slack monitoring from start - waited for Andrew to ask
Should have been more proactive about scheduled tasks vs just building capabilities
areasToImprove: Be more proactive - don't wait to be asked
Test things before claiming they work
Build automation scripts, not just configurations

experiment.name: Use qmd to search daily notes for pattern recognition
experiment.hypothesis: Can speed up context recall and find patterns across days
